commuter_solar.name: Commuter with Solar
commuter_solar.description: Away during peak solar hours, good overnight load shifting
commuter_solar.rationale: Away at work during midday (10am-3pm shoulder period), exports 80% of solar generation. Good load shifting to off-peak hours (1am-6am) for hot water and appliances.

commuter_no_solar.name: Commuter without Solar
commuter_no_solar.description: Standard commuter with hot water on timer
commuter_no_solar.rationale: Away during cheapest shoulder period (10am-3pm), unavoidable peak usage morning and evening. Hot water timer utilizes off-peak overnight.
